pageProps.content:
Experience

Zambia’s family-owned & run Royal Chundu is set on a private stretch of riverbank on the Zambezi River, just upstream of the iconic Victoria Falls.
Royal Chundu consists of 2 lodges – River Lodge & Island Lodge, & as the name suggests, both properties are fit for royalty. Ideal for honeymooners, couples or families, Royal Chundu is all about exceeding expectations.
The lodge is only a 40-minute drive from the Falls, making it the ideal base to explore this world wonder.

Stay

River Lodge at Royal Chundu is the main hub & the larger of the 2 lodges. There are 10 beautifully appointed, spacious riverfront suites, each with an en-suite bathroom, air-conditioning & a generous deck with spectacular views.
The entire lodge looks out onto the mighty Zambezi River on the opposite side of the river.
Island Lodge at Royal Chundu is the more private & exclusive of the 2 lodges. With a stunning location on Katambura Private Island, the lodge is surrounded by gentle river channels & lush trees. There are 4 elegant, air-conditioned villas at Island Lodge, each comprising an en-suite bathroom with a large open-air bath & a spectacular deck with views.

Activities

Apart from visiting the thundering Victoria Falls, guests may choose to take a short mokoro (dug-out canoe) trip to a local village or visit one of the local villages. Game drives & birding are also popular activities.
In addition to the above, guests can also do a trip to Livingstone town & enjoy a microlight flight over the Falls, river rafting or sunset boat cruises on the Zambezi.
A highlight is having lunch at Livingstone Island & swimming at Devil’s Pool – the edge of the mighty Vic Falls.

subfolders.title: David Livingstone Lodge
subfolders.description: David Livingstone Lodge & Spa is centrally located only 5km from the town of Livingstone in Zambia & offers a unique location with breathtaking views. As the name suggests, the majestic waterfall was discovered by the famous explorer, Dr David Livingstone in 1855 & is a must-see for guests visiting Zambia.

subfolders.title: Royal Chundu
subfolders.description: Zambia’s family-owned & run Royal Chundu is set on a private stretch of riverbank on the Zambezi River, just upstream of the iconic Victoria Falls. Royal Chundu consists of 2 lodges – River Lodge & Island Lodge, & as the name suggests, both properties are fit for royalty.  Ideal for honeymooners, couples or families, Royal Chundu is all about exceeding expectations.

subfolders.title: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma
subfolders.description: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma is a tree-fort safari lodge set on a dramatic bend of the Zambezi River within the game-packed Mosi-Oa-Tunya Park, upstream from the legendary Victoria Falls. Named after Dr David Livingstone’s knowledgeable & local guides, Sussi & Chuma is a laid-back, family-friendly lodge where guests can enjoy the park’s peace & tranquillity, while still being close enough to the action-packed Victoria Falls with all its fun-filled activities.

subfolders.title: Sindabezi Island Lodge
subfolders.description: Sindabezi Island Lodge is an exclusive camp offering luxurious island accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls on the Zambian side. A romantic hideaway with only 5 chalets & extraordinary river views, Sindabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & offers a range of fantastic fully inclusive activities.

subfolders.title: Taita Falcon Lodge
subfolders.description: Taita Falcon Lodge is set above the mighty Zambezi River, overlooking its winding waters & the dramatic cliffs of the Batoka Gorge.   This Zambian wilderness retreat is all about the views!  With its vast viewing platform, it is the perfect place to sit & take in Zambia’s scenic vistas.

subfolders.title: The Royal Livingstone
subfolders.description: The Royal Livingstone, like the name suggests, is a 5-star hotel situated on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia, within walking distance to The Falls. This charming hotel offers the discerning traveller an elegant & refined colonial ambience with world-class service & countless activities.

subfolders.title: Thorntree River Lodge
subfolders.description: Thorntree River Lodge, one of Zambia’s most contemporary lodges boasts a spectacular setting on the legendary Zambezi River, just upstream from Zambia’s biggest drawcard:  the mighty Victoria Falls. Thorntree has an eco-conscious design that incorporates nature & 21-century living.

subfolders.title: Toka Leya
subfolders.description: Toka Leya is a secluded luxury tented camp located 12km upstream from Victoria Falls & enjoys a beautiful location on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia. Set within the Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park, this unique tented camp is the ideal place to stay for those wishing to enjoy the magnificent scenery, river views & plenty of activities – while being close enough to experience the majestic Victoria Falls.

subfolders.title: Tongabezi Lodge
subfolders.description: Tongabezi Lodge in Zambia is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River & offers secluded & luxurious accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls. A romantic hideaway with extraordinary river views, Tongabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & is the ideal destination for the discerning traveller looking for romance, tranquillity & beautiful scenery.

whatWeLoveItems: Only lodge with extensive private Zambezi River frontage
